title: ShayLegal
author: ShayLegal
content: Tell me one thing you'd be comfortable doing and one thing you'd never do to get an all paid trip to a destination you've always wanted to travel to, I bet this would be a fun filled discussion.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: If to say I be girl, this your post for make brain wella because the the job for be how to just find one honourable and piam, I don enter Dubai go flex. Unfortunately,Â  I be man so e never enter my head how I wan get an all-paid trip go even if na Benin Republic. Another thing we enter my mind na when I still small, then person fit carry me say make we go on trip no be now wey I be adult and according to that song "Adulthood na scam" by Omolade, nothing come free now o. Make I carry chair sit down dey wait for people wey know somebody wey know another person wey sabi the politicians make them come tell us how them dey run am take travel for free unto say another person or people don pay everything.

comments.author: Justbillywitt
comments.body: My broda make we dey try to dey read and update ourselves with recent happenings in the local board before we go dey do some certain things. How this post carry dey helpful for this place now? You are not asking a question that crypto related or something that is beneficial to the forum. This you post is coming at the wrong time when efforts are being made to restore this local board to what it used to be. You see say people dey complain say the newbie and low rank members are spaming the board with anyhow post and you still dey talk this one. You no dey hear word abi you just wan do your thing? If you want to discuss about traveling opportunities look for places that such discussion are are appropriate and do that. If you had read this https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5473330.0 You for no just make this kind post. This has clearly shown that you don't read posts in this thread. Abeg make we try dey cordinate ourselves, we wey still be low rank members make we dey do things we go make the senior men them for this place happy, so that them go fit get mind to dey show us things wey go make us grow for this forum.

comments.author: ShayLegal

If you had read this https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5473330.0 You for no just make this kind post. This has clearly shown that you don't read posts in this thread. Abeg make we try dey cordinate ourselves, we wey still be low rank members make we dey do things we go make the senior men them for this place happy, so that them go fit get mind to dey show us things wey go make us grow for this forum.  I understand your point boss, but this thing actually dey crypto related. I was just trying to stir up a conversation. E get one Naija Trade Challenge wey you fit win prizes just by trading and participating in referral contests and P2P. You can win a trip to Dubai as first runner up. Na Bitget host the event, that's why I'm trying toÂ  share it as an opportunity for all of us to leverage on. Here's the link; https://www.bitget.com/events/activities/077e0ed772d45d73b48bf4461a23d624?color=blue

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Op wattin boss Justbillywitt tell you na the truth be that them dey try make the board dey some how organized by reducing shitposts and off topics and you dey here dey create topic wey no get any benefit to person wey dey read am, if to say for this thread na cruise you dey catch e for no pain but the question you dey ask sef na personal question and beside the link wey you post wattin dem dey do there na scam, the money wey dem wan take send you go the Dubai, na thief dem wan thief am? Some kind times make we sef dey think critically before we do some kind of things and make you know say more than 95 percent of anything wey tell you to refer person for this kind of opportunities na scam.And apart from that I dey always advise say if una wan post this kind of offtopic make una use our pidgin language make e for still hide from externals small.

comments.author: ShayLegal
comments.body: Quote from: Odohu on November 14, 2023, 12:30:33 PMIf to say I be girl, this your post for make brain wella because the the job for be how to just find one honourable and piam, I don enter Dubai go flex. Unfortunately,Â  I be man so e never enter my head how I wan get an all-paid trip go even if na Benin Republic. Another thing we enter my mind na when I still small, then person fit carry me say make we go on trip no be now wey I be adult and according to that song "Adulthood na scam" by Omolade, nothing come free now o. Make I carry chair sit down dey wait for people wey know somebody wey know another person wey sabi the politicians make them come tell us how them dey run am take travel for free unto say another person or people don pay everything.  Well, e go shock you if I tell you say way dey? You fit even Jand go Dubai wey you the dream of. There's an event on Bitget where you can trade, invite friends, earn points and win all expense paid trip to Dubai for 3 days, you fit earn about $1K too as second runner up.See the link to the event here, you fit work am bro; https://www.bitget.com/events/activities/077e0ed772d45d73b48bf4461a23d624?color=blue

comments.author: ShayLegal
comments.body: Quote from: Makus on November 15, 2023, 11:44:52 AMOp wattin boss Justbillywitt tell you na the truth be that them dey try make the board dey some how organized by reducing shitposts and off topics and you dey here dey create topic wey no get any benefit to person wey dey read am, if to say for this thread na cruise you dey catch e for no pain but the question you dey ask sef na personal question and beside the link wey you post wattin dem dey do there na scam, the money wey dem wan take send you go the Dubai, na thief dem wan thief am? Some kind times make we sef dey think critically before we do some kind of things and make you know say more than 95 percent of anything wey tell you to refer person for this kind of opportunities na scam.And apart from that I dey always advise say if una wan post this kind of offtopic make una use our pidgin language make e for still hide from externals small. Well, the opportunity na from well known Exchange, which is Bitget, go read about the details well or about Bitget. This no be Ponzi my brother. Good thing is, them no say make you invest money to get 2X back. Na simple event competition wey go sharpen your trading and afford you opportunity to earn as well as travel. I just the share for una as my fellow countrymen to take advantage.

Hope say entry requirement for the challenge no go make me run fa?

comments.author: Altcoiner007
comments.body: Quote from: ShayLegal on November 15, 2023, 04:56:26 PMQuote from: Makus on November 15, 2023, 11:44:52 AMOp wattin boss Justbillywitt tell you na the truth be that them dey try make the board dey some how organized by reducing shitposts and off topics and you dey here dey create topic wey no get any benefit to person wey dey read am, if to say for this thread na cruise you dey catch e for no pain but the question you dey ask sef na personal question and beside the link wey you post wattin dem dey do there na scam, the money wey dem wan take send you go the Dubai, na thief dem wan thief am? I know Bitget sha o. them dey hostÂ  plenty trading Competitions for their Platform and them dey reward. Abi no be them do KCGI that month? But the first time wey I read this your post, I just pass like... "Them don come again" I know been know say na that Exchange dey host wetin you been dey try gist. So wetin them bosses here dey tell you na true. Oyah, wetin dey involved. Talk am now.
